resources.string: This app was made by Andy, Jessica, Scott, and Seikun!

uWallet was designed to help busy students track their WatCard spendings on the go! With balancing academics, extracurricular activities, and a whole new lifestyle, students simply don\'t have time to be attentive to how much they\'re spending. uWallet is a simple and clean app to view all your WatCard expenses spent from the comfort and convenience of a mobile device.
uWallet was made by Seikun Kambashi, Scott So, Gabriel Wong, Jessica Wu and Andy Zhang.
